Okay
So if they don't get the balls back to Earth in a year, Earth will explode
Again, was a wish made on these before
And Kami made them, did he know they would do that, and if so, why didn't destroy them, considering he made another set of balls
And don't tell me they can't destroy them, because characters in Z were constantly worried about the balls getting destroyed

ARGH
